original_title: Приключения Тома Сойера и Гекльберри Финна
overview: Without a book about the adventures of Tom and his friends Huckleberry Finn and Becky Thatcher, one can not imagine the childhood of a child! The small but brave heroes Tom and Huck search for the treasure, become "pirates", enter into a dangerous battle with the Indian Joe.
title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn
